generatable.description: describes a resource and its references to other resources

alias.description: an Alias for the resource, incase the name overlaps with a global constant or any other important part

nameParts.description:
the attributes that make up the autogenerated name. All of the properties that you specify here will be asked by the constructor unless provided by a parent resource.
 use '_alias' if you want to add a value that is just used for the name generation

provides.description: the unique name this resource will be passed to its children as

additionalProperties.description: the value is an array with length 2 containing first the provides value of the parent resource and second the attribute of the parent that will be used as the value of the argument

inherits.description:
maps parent resources to the attributes in this resource

the key is the argument to wich it will be mapped.
the setter-method for the arguments here will be removed.

resources.description: the resources with their respective keys. the resource group is specified by the filename, so you just need to specify the subname for example with the aws_lambda_function you just need to specify function the case must be snake_case

datasources.description: the resources with their respective keys. the resource group is specified by the filename, so you just need to specify the subname for example with the aws_lambda_function you just need to specify function the case must be snake_case
